* [Contact Us](https://cityofoverton.com/contact-us/)



The OEDC Board typically meet on the third Tuesday of each month at 6:00 pm at the Overton City Hall Council Chambers at 111 W. North Street.  The meetings are open to the public and input is welcomed.

Christopher Hall, Chairman

Henry Smith, Board Member

DeAnne West, Board Member

Tuck Moon, Board Member

Curtis Gilbert, Board Member

Matthew Eastwood, Board Member

[BOARD Application](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/BOARD-Application.pdf)
